user.title: Required Entity Selection
user.description: Select the required entities for battery charging automation. These entities must be configured and available.

data_description.battery_soc_sensor: Sensor that reports the current battery state of charge (percentage)
data_description.battery_charging_switch: Switch that controls battery charging on/off
data_description.price_sensor: Tibber sensor with today/tomorrow price attributes

optional_entities.title: Optional Entity Selection
optional_entities.description: Optionally select additional entities for advanced features. Leave empty if not needed.

data_description.solar_forecast_sensor: Sensor providing daily solar production forecast (kWh)
data_description.battery_capacity_sensor: Sensor reporting battery capacity (Wh or kWh)
data_description.battery_charging_power: Input number for charger wattage (used for duration calculation)

schedule.title: Schedule Configuration
schedule.description: Configure charging schedules and SOC targets for night, day, and evening peak periods.

data_description.night_start_time: When the night charging window begins
data_description.night_end_time: When the night charging window ends (next day)
data_description.night_target_soc: Target battery percentage for night charging
data_description.day_schedule_enabled: Enable secondary charging window during the day
data_description.day_start_time: When the day charging window begins
data_description.day_end_time: When the day charging window ends
data_description.day_target_soc: Target battery percentage for day charging
data_description.evening_peak_start: When expensive evening peak period begins
data_description.evening_peak_end: When expensive evening peak period ends
data_description.evening_peak_target_soc: Minimum battery percentage before evening peak

error.entity_not_found: Entity not found in Home Assistant
error.schedule_conflict: Day schedule end time must be before evening peak start time

init.title: Configure Charge Cheapest
init.description: Adjust charging settings. Changes apply immediately without restart.

data_description.night_target_soc: Target battery percentage for night charging (0-100%)
data_description.day_target_soc: Target battery percentage for day charging (0-100%)
data_description.evening_peak_target_soc: Minimum battery percentage before evening peak (20-100%)
data_description.night_start_time: When the night charging window begins
data_description.night_end_time: When the night charging window ends (next day)
data_description.day_schedule_enabled: Enable secondary charging window during the day
data_description.day_start_time: When the day charging window begins
data_description.day_end_time: When the day charging window ends
data_description.evening_peak_start: When expensive evening peak period begins
data_description.evening_peak_end: When expensive evening peak period ends
data_description.notify_charging_scheduled: Send notification when charging is scheduled
data_description.notify_charging_skipped: Send notification when charging is skipped
data_description.notify_charging_error: Send notification when an error occurs
data_description.solar_forecast_enabled: Use solar forecast for dynamic SOC targets
data_description.morning_consumption_kwh: Expected energy consumption before solar production
data_description.soc_offset_kwh: Adjustment offset for SOC calculation tuning
data_description.minimum_soc_floor: Minimum SOC target regardless of forecast
data_description.failure_behavior: Action when price data is unavailable
data_description.default_charge_duration: Default charging duration for fallback mode
data_description.recreate_dashboard: Check to recreate the dashboard with default settings

error.schedule_conflict: Day schedule end time must be before evening peak start time

recreate_dashboard.name: Recreate Dashboard
recreate_dashboard.description: Deletes the existing Charge Cheapest dashboard and creates a fresh one with the default configuration.
